rules_text:
Kicker {1}{B} [i](You may pay an additional {1}{B} as you cast this spell.)[/i]
Choose target creature or planeswalker card in your graveyard. If Emerge from the Underrealm was kicked, return it to the battlefield. Otherwise, unearth it. [i](Return it from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the end step or if it would leave the battlefield.)[/i]
